phrases: Today was another exhausting day.
I just want to hurry home so I can relax.
K-Koichi...
Hazamada...
Hey, how are you doing?
Th-Thanks for everything the other day.
Um, are you all healed up now?
Kind Of. I was released from the hospital two days ago.
Where is that bastard I mean, where is Josuke?
He already went home.
Apparently, he found an invisible baby yesterday,
and there was a big fuss over finding her mother.
Is she a Stand user?
Apparently.
The baby has only warmed up to Josuke's father, Mr. Joestar,
and if he is not around, she turns everything around her invisible.
So is Mr. Joestar going to be in town for a while, then?
Probably.
I see.
By the way, Koichi, do you like to read manga?
Manga?
Oh, I guess about as much as anyone.
Have you heard of Rohan Kishibe, who draws Pink Dark Boy?
Pink Dark Boy?
Of course!
I am a huge fan!
Yeah?
You like it?
I guess you would call it horror suspense.
There are some pretty gross scenes,
but the thrills that seem to close in on you
and the realistic characters are great, are not they?
Right, right!
Did you know that Rohan Kishibe actually lives in Morioh?
Huh?!
What?!
He lives in Morioh?!
No way!
You cannot be serious!
Really?!
I could not believe it, either!
But I happened to overhear some realtors talking.
I know it seems unbelievable, but it is true!
Hey, want to go see if we can get some autographs?
Morioh Station
Yes!
Of course I will go!
Rohan Kishibe's House
Looks like we think alike!
Really?
Kishibe
Over there!
I think that might be his studio.
The light's on!
You are right...
I wonder if he has any other family.
I heard he lives alone.
He debuted at sixteen, and now he is twenty.
Twenty?!
He is so young!
So he became a pro at my age.
There is no point in snooping around, Koichi.
Try ringing the doorbell.
M-Me?
Oh, come on!
I am ordering you, as an older student.
I tend to get pretty nervous.
What?
That is not fair...
Episode 14 Let us Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 1
That face!
Rohan Kishibe!
He looks just like his picture in the New Year's deluxe edition!
Uh, I mean...
Rohan-sensei!
H-Huh?
Who are you two?
What are you doing?
Playing a prank?
N-No!
We would never!
Um, we are students at Budogaoka High School.
W-We are fans of yours, Sensei.
Fans?
Of mine?
You are readers?
So my address has gotten out.
N-No, um...
I just happened to overhear it.
So, I know this is sudden,
but it would make us really happy if we could get your autograph.
Fans of mine, eh?
That is good.
We might be on the same wavelength, then.
Huh?
Nothing, never mind.
Pardon.
An autograph or two is no problem at all.
Yes!
I guess it is a good thing we came.
I know.
Since you are here, would you like a tour of my studio?
Huh?
You will let us go into your studio?!
I am already done with my work for the day, so if you two would like...
Of course!
Then...
Pardon the intrusion!
Come in.
Wow!
Wow!
Raw 4-color manuscript!
This is amazing!
It has so much more impact!
I-I am so moved!
I-I-I am so glad that we came!
How long have you been working in Morioh?
I moved here three months ago.
My family home is in S City,
but I lived here for a time when I was a child.
Tokyo is very convenient, but it is pretty chaotic.
The environment is nowhere near
as calm as it is in Morioh, and I cannot work there.
Not to mention,
with the fax machines and copiers we have these days,
I have a system where, given four hours,
I can send in a complete manuscript.
You could say there is no point in living in
the city now, other than for pointless status.
Um...
So what do you do for assistants or staff?
I do not have any.
I draw it all by myself.
Huh?
All by yourself?!
You draw 19 pages of such elaborate art in just one week?!
I can draw them in four days.
Five if there are color pages.
What?!
On the remaining days, I have fun going on trips and such.
I do not really like dealing with people,
and that is why I chose to be a manga artist.
If I had an assistant, it would be harder for me to work.
That is so amazing...
Wow.
You are a genius!
Pardon me for a moment.
Whoa, a s-spider!
We really are out in the burbs.
There are a lot of bugs and spiders.
Um... Sensei?
I see...
So this spider is an Araneus ventricosus...
It can be found in houses and mountainous regions all across Japan.
Though it is an orb-weaver,
there are some that make webs day and night.
By the way,
do you two know what it takes to draw an interesting manga?
Reality!
Reality is the energy that breathes life into a piece of work,
and reality itself is entertainment.
People often think that manga are drawn from imagination and fantasy,
but that is not actually true!
For me, drawing something that I have experienced,
or something that has moved me, is what makes it interesting!
For example, in the city, people would just be grossed out by this spider and kill it.
As a manga artist, you need to know how its legs are connected,
where the eyes are, and how to tell the difference between a male
and a female in order to be able to draw it.
Apparently a spider's webbing hardens when it is exposed to the air,
but you have to know what hole it comes from,
and what its innards look like.
When a spider's belly is cut upon, how does it suffer before it dies?
You have to know these things for the sake of reality.
That is so cruel!
Cruel?!
An amateur brat like you is criticizing me, Rohan Kishibe?!
N-No!
I was not criticizing at all!
I am sorry!
I should have a taste, too.
Manga artists are really strange people, just as the world perceives them!
Very nice!
That agonized expression...
Perfect example of how one looks when puking!
I should sketch it.
R-Really?
Now it looks fake.
Forget it.
I will not sketch it.
It will not be of any use.
I-I am sorry.
Autographs, was not it?
I will go get a signing pen from the kitchen,
and bring out some tea, as well.
Oh, you do not have to...
But that is amazing!
I had no idea...
Pink Dark
Boy must be so amazing
because of how far he goes to figure out all kinds of things...
Um, Hazamada...
I know we just got here, but, um...
Maybe we should go home.
Huh?
Go home?
You want to go home?
Why?
This is a lot of fun!
I do not really have a reason, but...
I guess you could call it a hunch.
Though I am not usually that perceptive...
I just suddenly got the feeling that Rohan-sensei is a bit dangerous.
Dangerous?
Do you mean that he might be a Stand user?
No!
Nothing like that.
Just, um...
Just because Rohan-sensei's a bit unusual,
I do not think you should just assume that he is a Stand user.
I am not assuming that he is...
I just said I have a bad feeling.
Besides, if Rohan-sensei actually is a Stand user,
would not that be great for us?
That means I have something in common with a famous manga artist.
But, all right.
If you have a bad feeling, we can go home for today.
We can always come again.
But!
Only after I have looked at this thing that caught my eye.
Thing?
What thing?
Jeez, you are dense, Koichi!
On top of the desk, next to the phone.
Look carefully.
Oh!
C-Could this be...
Yup!
He said he just finished working, right?
I have been eyeing that carefully.
A manuscript for Pink Dark Boy that is just been finished?!
Does that mean no one else has even seen it yet?!
Once I get a glimpse of this, we can go home.
We should get permission first.
Koichi, you do not know manga artists at all.
These manuscripts, before they have gone to the printers,
are a closely-guarded trade secret!
There is no way he would let us outsiders read a
manuscript that has not even been checked by the editor yet!
I will have a look, then put it right back.
That is an even worse idea!
It is fine!
It is not like it can hurt anything.
Huh?
What is this feeling?
It is always a thrilling manga, but is this the impact of a raw manuscript?
I am getting goosebumps!
It is so good!
Hurry up and turn the page, Hazamada.
I am so moved!
It appears
that my manuscript was compatible with you two after all.
I thought you would read it.
And only those who are the first to read my manuscript, and are compatible...
H-Hazamada...
K-Koichi...
A-Ability?!
My hand!
K-Koichi!
What is going on?!
Morioh Landmark 5 Manga Artist Rohan Kishibe's House Get off at the Morioh Kotodai 2-chome bus stop and walk 1 minute.
Area: A mansion situated on 103 tsubo of land.
7LDK plus an attic.
If you actually go, he will pretend to be out.
There are a lot of things recorded in the human body.
Everything from the moment you were born.
In order to read that, I will turn you both into books.
Books that have your lives written in them.
Help!
You read the manga too, did not you?
It is happening to me, too!
Hazamada!
This will cause you no actual harm, so do not worry.
Wh-What are you trying to do?!
I told you earlier that for manga, the author's sense of reality is important, right?
Which means reading about your lives and
experiences will offer me realistic ideas.
You cannot get this from interviews!
You are going to tell me 100 realistically, as if I had experienced it myself.
Koichi Hirose.
Born March 28th, 1984, at 6:27 AM at Red Cross Hospital in S City.
You were born premature at 2325 grams, and spent a week in an incubator.
You are from a family of four, and your older sister's name is Ayana...
I see...
It appears that your grade school and middle school days were pretty ordinary,
and your personality is very honest.
That is very commendable.
You...
What is this ability that you have?!
Reverb?
Someone other than me has an ability like this?!
You, too?
Stand users!
This is...
Everything from April of 1999 on is amazing!
You have only had amazing experiences ever since!
Josuke Higashikata, Jotaro Kujo,
Yukako Yamagishi, Okuyasu Nijimura, Tamami Kobayashi...
I cannot believe it...
This is amazing!
It is so entertaining!
I just discovered the best material a manga artist could hope for, Koichi Hirose!
Shining Diamond,
Star Platinum,
The Hand, Love Deluxe, et cetera, et cetera!
Wh-What do you plan on doing with us?!
I am going to take your memories
so I can use them as material for my manga!
Reverb!
Please stop attacking us with your Stand immediately!
Otherwise...
Are you going to have Reverb Act 2 attack me with sound?
Yes!
Please release me from your Stand!
I will not hold back!
I know.
It is written on your 11th page.
You are far more timid than most people and taken rather lightly by others,
but when it is necessary, you have courage that can overpower your fear.
Truly magnificent!
I am very impressed with you!
I am sure my readers will like your personality, too.
I am not bluffing!
I am really going to attack you!
Oh, shut up...
And just try it!
Reverb Act 2!
Crash
Crash
Huh?
I-I missed?!
Did you accidentally miss or did you miss on purpose?
Your control is way off!
Then how about this?!
Crash
Where are you attacking?!
Koichi, sadly for you, I have put a safety lock on Reverb.
Huh?
You are now unable to attack me.
Safety lock?
Look...
I have already written it into your 11th page, right here.
I can not attack the manga artist, Rohan Kishibe
I can not attack the manga artist, Rohan Kishibe.
an
ot
can not
This is Heaven's Door's ability.
It let us me read people's experiences via words and pictures,
and it also allows me to write into your memories.
You will now never be able to harm me in any way, shape, or form.
Wh-What?!
But that is all I am going to mess with.
If I write in any more, it will make your life fake,
so it would not benefit my work at all.
Let us see...
I guess I will have a look at Hazamada, too.
Sensei!
You are a genius!
I admire you!
Huh...
I see.
Let us see...
You sometimes feel relief after you have
picked on things weaker than yourself, like kittens and small birds.
You want to force yourself on Junko from 3-E,
but you are too cowardly, so you cannot.
Your balls often get sweaty,
and when you are adjusting them during class,
nothing gives you a greater thrill than the thought that someone might see you.
You are an awful man.
There is no way my readers would like you if I wrote you into my manga.
You are useless.
No fair!
There is no hope for me!
Why?
Why are you doing this?
Even without reading about my experiences, you are an amazing manga artist!
The world knows that!
You are living in this amazing house at the age of twenty!
You are doing much better than most people your age!
And yet, why do you need my memories?!
Do you think that I, Rohan Kishibe, draw manga
for the sake of money and attention?!
I am drawing manga so people will read it!
So someone will read it!
That is the only reason!
It is a very simple reason, but I do not care about anything else!
So that people will read it, I look for realistic material every day!
Listen well.
Whenever I finish a manuscript, I feel amazing.
Everyone feels great after finishing work, do not they?
But that feeling only lasts for an instant.
It is only a little while,
because I start thinking that no one's going to read my completed manga,
and my insecurities start to grow.
Then I get even more insecure because, maybe next week,
no one's going to read it, and then I might not know what
to draw anymore, and I might not feel like doing anything anymore.
These feelings have been reoccurring over and over since I was sixteen.
Until three months ago, when someone shot me with an arrow,
and I gained the ability of Heaven's Door.
Keicho Nijimura...
Yes, that was also written in you.
I am sure you two do not understand the feeling of having found
the best material to use for drawing a masterpiece!
But this is it, right now!
It is the best!
Koichi, I am going to make your reality mine!
See, Koichi?
Was not Rohan-sensei a great guy?
Are not you glad we went?
Yeah!
It was so much fun!
To Hirose Rohan Kishibe
Not only did he give us these great autographs,
he even served us tea and cookies.
I would love to go again.
Yeah.
Let us definitely go again.
Well, I am heading this way, so...
He really was a great guy.
You will never speak of this, Koichi.
Huh?!
Wh-Why?!
How did I lose 20 kilograms?
But I do not look any different!
It reads five kilograms...
The scale's not broken.
Th-This is impossible!
Th-This has to be the work of an enemy Stand user!
Otherwise, there is no way I would lose 20 kilograms!
But who...
I need to talk to Josuke about this.
What is the matter, Ko?
Huh?
Me? YOU-Uh...
Wait...
What was it?
What are you talking about?
Weirdo.
What is wrong?
Oh, nothing.
My little brother's wandering around in his underwear.
What was it?
I could have sworn I thought about something really important just now.
Well, if I forgot about it, it cannot be that important.
Man, my shoes and bag sure feel heavy today.
Huh?
Th-This house...
Why?
I somehow ended up walking to Rohan-sensei's house without realizing it.
The door's open...
I would like to stop by and thank him for yesterday,
but then I would be late for school.
It is probably a bad idea.
He might actually still be asleep since he is a manga artist.
I really should not just barge into his house.
It is really not a good idea...
Hey, did you see that, Okuyasu?
Yeah...
We followed Koichi because he was heading in the
opposite direction of the school, but what the heck is he doing?
Whose house is that?
I have my doubts, but it is not some chick, is it?
Rohan-sensei...
He is working so frantically.
But I wonder what it is...
I cannot shake the feeling that being here is actually terrifying.
What is it?
I am glad you came.
I have been waiting for you.
You are right on time.
Episode 15 Let us Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 2
Episode 15 Let us Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 2
